title: Confessions Collection Vol. 1
description: Descend into a world of deception, depravity, decadence, desire and desperation…In the opulent setting of London's aristocracy, lives a young woman fractured into two distinct individuals, one face with multiple facets.One façade, a whore, London Brown, who will confess unfathomable truths, the other, a loving daughter, Desniah Williams will pull back the curtain to reveal what lurks in the shadows. Caden Jacob Carrington V, a politician will do anything to reclaim the woman he lost, including dredging up pains of the past. Rhys Christos Edward Stowell, a philanthropist will fight to win the woman he loves while baring the darkness of his soul.
author: Leila DeSint
